thread.title: Mice in New York Carry Rare and Dangerous Diseases, Study Finds

author: Melanie Grayce West
title: Mice in New York Carry Rare and Dangerous Diseases, Study Finds
text:
New York City house mice, the kind probably nibbling away in the pantry, are leaving behind more than an unwelcome mess.
Big Apple mice carry a wide assortment of bacteria and viruses that can cause maladies ranging from mild to life-threatening in humans, according to research published Tuesday.
Researchers from the Center for Infection and... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
